hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q "start planet-eden"; then powershell -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; echo 'Simulation launched. Monitoring for 5 seconds...'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5; echo 'Initial monitoring complete.'"; fi
powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; Add-Content -Path '.claude/session-log.txt' -Value \"Session ended: $timestamp\"; echo 'Session logged'"
